tossup_question: -   –  If molten sodium is burned in a pure oxygen atmosphere, a salt is formed. Which of the following is the likely identity of this salt?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Na_(2)O
X) Na_(2)O_(2)
Y) NaO_(2)
Z) NaO_(3)
bonus_question: -   –  Assuming that none of the following molecules contain any rings, which one contains exactly one carbon-carbon or carbon-oxygen double bond?
